idea-plugin.name: Php Inspections (EA Extended)
idea-plugin.description:
Extended PHP code inspections set.

Detecting:
- architecture related issues (e.g. design patterns violations)
- possible code constructs simplifications
- weak types control (important in Enterprise Applications)
- micro-optimization cases (eg. un-necessary double quotes)
- not optimal, duplicate and suspicious if conditions

Some of inspections are expecting conditional statements (eg. if) to use group statement for wrapping body expressions. When this requirement is met then additional inspections are applied to source code.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
31 Jan 2015: bug-fixes, improvements and new inspections:

- not optimal if conditions: added new pattern (instanceof and identity operations)
- 'is_null(...)' usage: null and not null replacement hints separated
- callable parameter usage violates definition: fixed class-interface link recognition, reduced amount of false-positives

- alias functions usage inspection added
- useless unset inspection added
- nested ternary operator inspection added
- resources consuming array function used in loop inspection added
